## About this blog

This is the blog for the Mouse Imaging Centre. Here you'll find a collection
of our thoughts on imaging, statistics, and biology, written by our staff,
students, and PIs.

## About the us

The Mouse Imaging Centre operates out of the Hospital for Sick Children in Toronto, 
our mission is to use high-throughput mouse imaging to answer important questions 
about biology. For more about us please visit our [website](http://www.mouseimaging.ca/).
